name: com.meta.xr.sdk.interaction.ovr.samples
displayName: Meta XR Interaction SDK OVR Samples
description: Contains sample scenes, prefabs, and art assets for Interaction SDK, using OVR variants of the player rig.

samples.description: Scenes that demonstrate multiple variations of an interaction model
Scenes that demonstrate a single feature in isolation
